synopsis.text: Girls with extraordinary abilities and contrasting personalities, Mikage and Tomomi Matsunaga are the Miracle Girls. Mikage, a brilliant student with a penchant for fashion, is deeply in love with her sempai who is studying in London. Meanwhile, Tomomi, a sports prodigy and a tomboy, is in a relationship with Noda. The twins share a telepathic bond and can teleport by linking their pinky fingers. As they navigate through their teenage lives, they encounter an array of challenges, including a self-centered princess named Marie, who has connections with an ancient legend and a familiar girl, Emma. With their unique abilities and shared bond, the sisters must face these trials while juggling their everyday school lives and relationships. Experience the thrilling journey of the Miracle Girls as they unravel the mysteries surrounding Marie and the ancient legend, all while dealing with the usual ups and downs of being a teenager.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
